website_summaries.verdict: A budget-priced 2-in-1 model with a trim design and some user-friendly features. A good choice for light use such as web surfing and minor work tasks.
pros: Very affordable 2-in-1 tablet with a keyboard that is easy to attach, and works like a laptop when in place
Slim design with a 10-inch screen is practical for anyone who needs a compact model
cons: Not as responsive as other models we considered
for the price, but doesn't provide dynamic image quality

customer_reviews.title: A Happy Wife is a Happy Life!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife so she could watch TV and Facebook at the same time. She had a tablet that was nearing the end of it life and kept complaining she kept getting kicked off line. My son (Computer Scientist) did some research and suggested this one was a good deal for the price. The headline says the rest.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Mine broke within a few months.
customer_reviews.text: This tablet only lasted a few months. It got stuck on the opening screen. I did lots of research on how to fix it and what I learned was the only way to fix it is to try to contact RCA. They told me it’s a common problem because the ROM wasn’t installed. Btw, I don’t even know what that means. I was told, I could send it back at my expense. It would take 6-8 weeks to get it and I had to pay for the shipping to have it sent back to me. I won’t by any RCA product again.
customer_reviews.author: hollie brogan

customer_reviews.title: Barely Six Months Old and DEAD!
customer_reviews.text: Unit was working fine until just a few days ago when it suddenly rebooted. It comes up to the main Android screen showing clock, notifications (blank), and buttons at the bottom of the screen. Desktop blank, no background or icons. Then suddenly reboots again, and again, and again.... Removed the SD card, no change, attempted restart in safe mode, no change. Run like hell! Do not buy this piece of crap. I should have listened to the one star reviews on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as I have a laptop and my kids have their own laptops. This tablet works great. The only problem with it is it doesn't seem to stay charged and when you do plug it in to charge, it takes a while. My husband doesn't really do anything that would require anything stronger. I do like it and am impressed with it besides the charging issue.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Shalna

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece for her 11th birthday. Ended up buying my 67 year old dad one, too! It's easier than a laptop to lug around. Has both touch screen and detachable keyboard (touch screen keys are big enough for my dad to see). Great for just about all ages. Now my kids want one, too. Definetely a good deal for the pirce. I mean, it's no Surface Pro, but for 89$, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Crap doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom but she was sick and didnt use it right away. When I tried to set it up for her the other day it wouldnt start up at all. I googled the instructions because it didnt come with any and found a lot of reviews that this Tablet has not worked for them either. I cant get it to shut down and all that shows up on the screen is Viking Pro. Dont buy this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Dupree

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this tablet for about 10 months. For the price (cheap), it meets my expectations--I can shop, read, and watch videos without many problems. Don't expect good photos, fast connections, or a great speaker (I use a portable iHome speaker if not using earbuds). There are some apps that are not compatible--I would like to have Yelp! and Yahoo Fantasy Football. The biggest problem I have experienced is that my charger started heating up and this week it actually melted on one corner when I plugged it in overnight. Fortunately the plastic smell got my attention, I assume this is a rare occurrence, as there has been no recall that I know of.
customer_reviews.author: Kitchen Harpy

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: This tablet does not connect to WiFi and it will not read an SD card I can't do anything on it at all I have had it since March 2nd 2017 hoping maybe in different. Places and with a different SD card it would work but it doesn't I'm very upset with this. I had one before this for a year and I dropped it and broke the screen so I bought a new one thinking it was the same and it's nothing like it was at all
customer_reviews.author: Curtis T.

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Portable, long battery life (as long as you aren't running tons of apps), easy to use, keyboard protects screen during transport. I use it to check email, facebook, listen to music, and watch movies. Works great for those uses. Can also use with Chromecast Cons: hard to type on small keyboard (may be personal problem because I have thick fingers), speaker crackles when volume turned up all the way, mouse pad on keyboard takes a while to learn to use. Overall very pleased with tablet and it's a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This tablet/laptop is AMAZING. The bad reviews here are because they paid $100 and expected a $500 iPad. No, this isn’t an iPad. But it is a completely capable tablet that conveniently rivals a decent laptop. The keyboard portion attaches effortlessly to the tablet and it has a true laptop feel at that point. I’m definitely ordering more of these.
customer_reviews.author: A. A

customer_reviews.title: this thing is pretty fantastic. I used it as a multimedia supplement ...
customer_reviews.text: For $100, this thing is pretty fantastic. I used it as a multimedia supplement for an academic poster (velcroed it on) and it drew a lot of attention. Easily lasted the full 5-hour poster session, too, so the battery life is solid. All this said, I don't actually use it for anything besides that, but while playing around with it it was decently snappy and responsive. Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: ThunderPumpkin

customer_reviews.title: No 5G WI-FI
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tablet for my son and was disappointed to have him tell me it was too slow to play a game he likes. After doing a lot of checking to see why it was slow I realized the tablet wasn't slow but the internet was slow because it didn't connect to my WI-FI at 5G speed. I didn't even think to check this when I bought it because the rest of the specs were so good. Next time I will know better but not an RCA tablet. Really stupid that a modern tablet doesn't have 5G. Disappointed Dad
customer_reviews.author: SMS

customer_reviews.title: My kids love them
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality tablet for the price. I have one of these for each of my kids. The keyboard makes it better for school work and props it up conveniently for watching videos. At this price, I can afford to buy them replacements when they inevitably break them (the fault of the kids, not the tablet).
customer_reviews.author: NorthshorecajunTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Basically the Equivalent of a Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Basically the Equivalent of a Chromebook. I used to lease Chromebooks out at my local library until I got internet at home. The keyboard housing is surprisingly made out of metal, which shocked me. Picked-up the settings directly from my Android phone, and basically cloned it, which I though was great. Only downside is that you will want to try to keep it plugged in during heavy usage, because the battery recharge cycle is treacherously slow. Also, I gauged battery life as 3.5 to 4.5 hours if you stream video, and I am an avid youtuber watcher. Overall... BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: cbond1c

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo sssllloowww, I def have buyers remorse on this one. It runs so slow that it’s maddening. Also it found my WiFi and connected just fine until it updated it’s software then promptly disconnected and will not reconnect to my ISP no matter what I do. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: J-dubya

customer_reviews.title: Dad loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad for a fathers day gift. He loves it. It works great, very fast. He uses it every day and it is pretty simple to learn how to use. Dad is not big into tech, so this would be a great first tablet for any one to learn on. I was amazed on how fast it was, I may have to get one for myself :-) Dano
customer_reviews.author: Godzukidan

customer_reviews.title: We definitely like this product
customer_reviews.text: We definitely like this product. I would recommend it for anyone that is doing basic stuff. Don't expect good photos. Good enough for some Skype, but it's fuzzy. Speakers aren't great either, but I use a headset/bluetooth almost all the time anyway. Some apps aren't compatible, but it's not too many. I originally bought it as an introductory "computer" for my non-computer BF. He never wanted a tablet, but when he got this, he never put it down. When his broke and the table I had got old, I bought 2 at under $100.00 each. We use ours everyday for games (mostly), FB, YouTube and email.
customer_reviews.author: MsChristineH

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money !
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap, all plastic, more like a kids toy then anything, kinda slow, you have to buy a cover for it for sure thats how cheap feeling it is ! its not worth the price , if you like junk or cheap plastic this would be great, but the sound as well is crap, the speaker is in the corner so sounds as if the sound is on one side, you need a blue tooth speaker to hear all the sounds, i have had cheaper tablets feel better quality then this , the is very thin plastic one drop and its done
customer_reviews.author: T. LOCKHART

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 year old son to use for school. He has installed Microsoft Word and power point and they work great. I haven't been able to save to his flash drive, but it's easy to share (I email it to myself) amd save from a computer. It seems very durable and he can easily remove the tablet from the keyboard. For the price, you can't go wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: BethanyLAK

customer_reviews.title: 88yr. old mom loves the RCA Viking Pro.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 88year old mother. She wanted another RCA because she's had an RCA Maven Pro for a few years and she's familiar with how it works. Her old one was starting to slow down (maybe from all the games on it). I can't inform you about the battery life as I just got it yesterday and set it up for her. We are both satisfied with it. No problems so far. She said she likes the slightly smaller size and lighter weight compared to the Maven Pro. I have an ipad, but if it were to need replaced, I would get one of these for myself. She doesn't like the keyboard, but it is easily detached.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband because his Ipad died and living on a budget had to find something cost efficient. He LOVES this tablet. Has better screen he stated he can actually see better. Does apps fast and he can get more than he did with his ipad. Will be getting a couple more one for me and one for my grandson. Very happy with purchase. Start up was easy, great size, got the exact case that fits great. HAPPY HAPPY HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: Judith Russell

customer_reviews.title: No help from amazon either
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this product as it stop working after two month would not recommend , and seller will not make good on it
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Less than $150, really? This is a great little tablet and with the keyboard. Anyone who wants a simple Android device with decent specs should get this. I am ordering as many as I can get for my company.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lambert

customer_reviews.title: It worked fine for 1 month
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for 1 month. I didn't use it for 1 month. On the third month, when I turned it on, screen was very dim, unclear, and left after images. Few days later, the screen became totally dark except for the left 1/4 inch of the screen. I don't know what is wrong with it. I had many tablets and smart phones in the past. Never had this problem. Tried to have it fixed with RCA using the 1 year warranty. I tried three times online. After the initial automated email response, then no followup or instruction as to how I may have my tablet fixed. So, three month after purchase, I have a $90 paper weight...
customer_reviews.author: J. Ding

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like RCA products I've had a tablet before I've had it for 7 years still works but it was really slow so I got a new one this one so much faster and so much better than my old one I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big bang for buck. Great little machine.
customer_reviews.text: New item in retail box. Excellent condition. Started up and works OK. Video resolution is good. Runs youtube like a PC. Response is very fast, and no lags. Keyboard is sturdy. Trackpad works as required. Camera not so good, but this tablet is NOT for shooting photos. I bought for reading pdf mags on a larger screen on a portable device. My 7" nexus was too small. Play store works like normal. Free MS office apps available for download. Android 5.0 works good enough, but no update available from RCA.
customer_reviews.author: Roger M

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This tablet has a lot more capability than the low price would suggest. I got one for my son to do online school, and was impressed enough to buy another for when i don't want to fire up the laptop. Very good tablet, would compare to one twice its price.
customer_reviews.author: EdTheTech

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, I prefer my Asus
customer_reviews.text: I dont like it as much as my Asus 10" for many little reasons, but for the money it's not a bad deal. UPDATE: Changed my mind after further use. This is garbage. Touch screen works 50%, it's slow, and the battery wont last a short flight on a plane. All the "regerts"
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Easy to learn!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a senior citizen and wanted to step up to 2020. This was the perfect choice. With absolutely no knowledge of computers I teach myself something new every day, even just the littlest thing. I am three weeks into it and going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Ornella

customer_reviews.title: Won't charge - Doesn't pick up Wi-Fi - worthless
customer_reviews.text: SO sorry I bought this. It won't take a charge and it won't pick up a Wi-Fi signal. I sat at a conference watching everyone else working on their tablets while I sat staring at mine wondering what was wrong. I left it alone for a few weeks after I got home. Now, it is PLUGGED IN and charging, but it keeps shutting off saying "Low Battery". It's been at 1% for at least 3 hours. TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: I have been using another brand with an aftermarket keyboard. This unit with the matched keyboard has given me excellent service. It's fast, accurate and has an excellent picture. However, the touch portion of she screen is slightly off, not to mention my finger doesn't always hit the right spot, however, that may be due to my age. The screen isn't quite as sensitive as I'd hoped. I can work around it. The battery life is impressive and recharges surprisingly fast.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Drake

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. I have an almost identical one, also from RCA, which runs Windows, but their specs are more suited to Android. However, both run well.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Little

customer_reviews.title: It works for simple tasks
customer_reviews.text: It really is very slow. The processor is not very fast. Also It can't be rooted. That is a problem for me. I was hoping that I could get better performance from this tablet. If you just want a tablet for reading a book or checking email this is OK, but don't count on it for much more.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: This RCA tablet has defects
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my grandson. It never worked. No technical support number. We had to go through RCA's facebook page. We have to send in in for repair. It is garbage
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: really liked it until it quit charging
customer_reviews.text: really liked it until it quit charging. : ( I was very disappointed. When I asked my computer guy what was wrong he said the brain inside the computer wasn't getting the message from the charger. Could he repair it? Not an RCA because the parts are way too expensive. Sadly I had to return it. THEN ... UPS and Amazon could not get their act together to pick it up at my home address; not where it was delivered. Finally my friend had to mail me the label. Amazon better not return it to me!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This tablet/laptop is not good
customer_reviews.text: Whatever you do, do NOT buy this laptop/tablet for two reasons? First of all, the tablet/laptop doesn't charge while being in the desktop. And second, the touchpad is so sensitive that if you type on the keyboard, something strange pops up like a menu. The only good thing that I can say is that the screen is detachable. Bottom line, if u are lookin' for a 2 in 1 tablet/laptop, this mediocre product is NOT it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Pokryska

customer_reviews.title: I like them as they seem to last longer than some ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have purchased, I like them as they seem to last longer than some of the other tablets I have purchased how ever, the keyboard stops working within a year and now the screen freezes or goes crazy with out touching it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as Kindle
customer_reviews.text: RCA tablet is less than 6weeks old and it started running very slow within the first two weeks. It will freeze in the middle of games or surfing. Not pleased at all with this purchase, wanted to return but did not keep original packaging. No more electronic purchases for me.
customer_reviews.author: Anyabelle....I love this game, it makes you think.

customer_reviews.title: Serves simple purposes
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Tablet, because I'm not too interested in keeping up with modern technology. However, I got it to view movies vs. sitting in front of my computer and/or use my laptop that blows out too much heat. It's an Android which serves the purpose. The keyboard is a plus! Not crazy about the free application, but you get what you pay for. Otherwise, a decent tablet that serves simple purposes.
customer_reviews.author: NCh

customer_reviews.title: False description
customer_reviews.text: The description lists ports usb 2.0 and HDMI... they were not on it nor was it on the replacement. I promptly returned both for a refund. I'm not very happy. This kind of thing happens too often. I normally just keep it but seriously. Describe appropriately and don't mislead consumers.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Very disapointing
customer_reviews.text: I could not return this fast enough. The screen had issues and made it impossible to use without the keyboard. It would not charge. And the ability to add apps seemed limited.
customer_reviews.author: H Clay

customer_reviews.title: Constantly drops apps from memory and their data.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, it would be a good tablet except for 1 BIG issue. I will download an app, and it works fine. Turn the tablet off and then back on...the app is gone along with it's data. As if I had never downloaded and used it. Very frustrating. I've checked, the tablet has plenty of memory space remaining. It just forgets apps. It's nice other than that. Due to this issue, I recommend buying a different tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Budget Computer
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for someone looking for a useful device on a budget. You can also download Google Play apps and use Microsoft Word. Simple but functional! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Blinkowl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for what we wanted but did not work well
customer_reviews.text: We ended up returning it because there seemed to be a disconnect between the keyboard and the actual screen while in use. We bought it for a granddaughter and it was very frustrating for her!
customer_reviews.author: TLV

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tablet for my girl and she loves it and she doesn't have to worry about sharing it with our 2yr son cause he got her old one that they fought over.
customer_reviews.author: terrance cobb

customer_reviews.title: Games are not in play store
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is games you can normally get are not im the app store and there is a delay in typing i will be ordering a totally different tablet with key board not eeally liking it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I've had multiple tablets over the years and this one is the best! It's definitely my favorite. It's the only one that hasn't just up and stopped working or froze while I'm on an app.
customer_reviews.author: Colby I. Beck

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE - AD LISTING IS INCORRECT
customer_reviews.text: THIS ITEM DOES NOT HAVE A REGULAR USB PORT AS IT SAYS IT DOES IN ITS AD AND SHOWS IN THE PHOTOGRAPHS! This is the second RCA tablet I have ordered, received and returned due to the same issue. I need to have a regular USB port on one.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle White

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The Pros, sharp screen, very responsive and lots of room for apps. The Cons, the sound level could be better and a wee bit heavier than you would think ... however, a terrific value.
customer_reviews.author: Marvelouss

customer_reviews.title: An excellent tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Bought mine about a year ago. Got one refurbished. It's excellent and I love it. Couldn't ask for a better tablet. Plays all the games I want and it has a nice bit of memory. A++
customer_reviews.author: Pudding

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For an inexpencive tablet for watching Netflix,movies,youtube and music its great
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Miller

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work at all.
customer_reviews.text: The tablet doesn’t work. When you type, it skips everywhere making it impossible to type a document or email. It’s extremely slow just to browse small things on internet and now all of a sudden the screen image keeps blurring out when I want to use Hulu or amazon apps. I bought this thinking it would be perfect for email, word, browsing the internet and streaming tv or movies on apps. I needed something for my new business. I’m going to throw this away and buy something nicer....
customer_reviews.author: Adria

customer_reviews.title: Operational system is of no good.
customer_reviews.text: This tablet have no use. The operational system have no use it stick. Then the tablet go blank. This product is of very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good tablet for the price. Pros: Inexpensive Decent graphics Does all tasks and runs all apps without issue Like that the keyboard holds up the screen Cons: Cheap look and feel but it is well worth it plus it comes with a keyboard
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: My only dislike is that the Android system can not be updated to a newer version. Other than that it is great. I love the detachable key board. The screen quality is great when I play a game. Very nice product and the price was not crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Miller

customer_reviews.title: A little slow Loading
customer_reviews.text: Overall the device met my expectations. The literature was a little sparse so you had to figure things out on your own or go to the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bailon

customer_reviews.title: I like the Viking best above the rest.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the smaller size. Can fit better in pocketbook. I like the features on the Viking. I just wish the batteries would last longer or you could replace them.
customer_reviews.author: DJReader

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet for little money
customer_reviews.text: Slow once multiple apps are installed. Battery life is also very low. Camera resolution is very low and very grainy
customer_reviews.author: Vance

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a year ago and really liked it but it totally crashed, thought it would last longer for what I paid. Bought a different brand, more features, longer battery life etc., and $20 cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: The first one arrived with a broken screen. However amazon replaced quickly. Great value, functions well. Bought for an upcoming trip. I really like the detachable screen and touch screen. Am purchasing another for our home. Great for web surfing, and reading.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is amazing!! I was alittle worried because of some reviews that I have read and the great price for the laptop. But it is so worth the money. It is easy to use, started right up and runs perfectly. I am mainly using it to write books with but I was on the internet with no problems. So if you are thinking about getting it....go for it! You will not be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Slow as hell. It is so slow that it is basically unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great but I can tell the processing power isn't there
customer_reviews.text: Bought for quick emails and movies while traveling. Works great but I can tell the processing power isn't there. For the money and what I use it for it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad don't buy
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work with a strong network. It only works with a bad internet connection.
customer_reviews.author: Beth345

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a month, won’t turn on at all. Lasted just long enough to outlast the return time
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Swanty

customer_reviews.title: RCA Viking Pro
customer_reviews.text: I basically use this device for viewing family and vacation pictures. I is quite slow to boot and slow in loading pictures. Additionally, it needs constant charging.
customer_reviews.author: Nogal

customer_reviews.title: ... just started to used my Viking pro and I love it already
customer_reviews.text: I have just started to used my Viking pro and I love it already... The Moment it booted the wifi was there and ready to be used the keyboard is really nice I love it... So I am about to go and explore my 2 in 1 and see what it has to offer me...
customer_reviews.author: Roses

customer_reviews.title: Please keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Please don’t waste your money! It’s the slowest thing ever. For the price I expected it to not be perfect, but it doesn’t even make a good paperweight. It’s the most frustrating thing I have ever had to mess with!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Tidman

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter tablet
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is a good size. The keyboard is very nice. The resolution is good. It can be a little slow in its responsiveness, but otherwise works well. Even though it is an android tablet, some play store apps are not available. Most notable is the Weatherbug app.
customer_reviews.author: JDStudent

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: I'm not happy with the tablet at all . its very slow for one it turns off all the time. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend ordering from this company! I ordered a tablet it did not work weeks later still waiting to be for money back
customer_reviews.author: carole heberer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied So Far
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really expect much from this tablet and was pleasantly surprised. I mainly got it for surfing & writing. The small keyboard takes a little getting used to because it's smaller than my laptop, but bigger than my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Randall

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet for a fabulous price. The 32 gig is definitely a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Elda

customer_reviews.title: Computer
customer_reviews.text: Chrome didn't work well. did not recognize devises from UBS port. Keyboard to small. Sent it back
customer_reviews.author: John DeCristofano

customer_reviews.title: A basic tablet
customer_reviews.text: My dad only uses it to browse the internet but he’s been using it every day for 9 months and it still works really well. The keyboard doesn’t work that well though.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it. Started to get one for ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Started to get one for myself but it's a bit big for my small hands. Fast & powerful for a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: This product hasn't worked since we got it. Put it aside until I could look at it later and it just goes to Viking Pro splash screen.
customer_reviews.author: kerry lindberg

customer_reviews.title: Very slow
customer_reviews.text: Slowwwwww you get what you pay for with this one. Be sure to start it up a half hour before you want to use it because its pretty much useless until everything updates. Would return it if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Soulravers

customer_reviews.title: When it works, great -- but when it doesn't...
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the $90. Huge disappointment. When it works, the device is fine -- light, easy to type, nice screen.... but it fails to load at least 70% of the time. it is SO slow and wonky. Apps disappear, won't load. Pe take forever to start. This morning I rebooted the device and it went into a spiral -- took forever to startup. Now it seems that the Kindle app isn't working. Frustrating. Just skip.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to do quotes and invoices on the go for my business and I love it. Comes with WPS office which is essentially a free app version of Microsoft office. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Hinze

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with ordering this one bettr off spending more
customer_reviews.text: Thought would last longer since npt used much it has issue with google services. And wont let you do anything even when factory reset
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: Nice tablet keyboard works great plus screen works great as well
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is a waste of money! The computer I had back in 2000 was faster. It takes up to 2 minutes just to boot up.
customer_reviews.author: BobF1

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about 2 months and then quit ..would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: BobbiJean

customer_reviews.title: RCA Viking Pro 10"
customer_reviews.text: This works just fine for me. I've added all me necessary apps and I'm moving right along.
customer_reviews.author: strictlybusiness01

customer_reviews.title: WIFI Connection Issuses
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tablet a month ago because I really enjoy the android platform. The keyboard works great but when you detach it the query key pad does not work well. Also for what ever reason the one I have has to be turned off and then back on to reconnect it to WiFi. It will not stay connected to WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one for my wife and I. We are both enjoying them and the only con which I have found so far is that there are a limited amount of apps on Google play that the tablet supports. With a 10 inch screen and 32 gigs of memory, you really can't complain for the price that is paid, however
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tablet! As for the keyboard...
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet! It's a great size, runs smoothly with no hiccups, has excellent sound, and offers plenty of options for entertaining apps and other features. It's sturdily built, as is the keyboard, although the keys themselves will take some getting used to. Some sacrifices were made to buttons that you would find on a traditional keyboard, which is typical given the smaller size, but the trackpad is EXTREMELY sensitive, making the cursor jump to various places or make changes on the screen that I didn't actually want, so be forewarned. If I could give them separate reviews, I'd give the tablet itself 5 stars (more if only it were possible), but the keyboard, I'd give maybe a 2-3.
customer_reviews.author: Pufferung

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: Item worked fine but stopped all of a sudden, had to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: oliver cole

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: For the price it does what it is suppose to do. Better then the one I paid over $300 for. Am well pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this tablet! Easy 2use even for my 2 1/2 yr. old nephew! It is a bit heavy even without the keyboard! Wish the battery use was longer than 4.5 hrs. Would buy another one brand new for the same price I bought this one or less!
customer_reviews.author: CornBread & Collard Greens

customer_reviews.title: This is a really great tablet/netbook combo!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great tablet/netbook combo! Super fast, lots of memory! Crisp, clear screen and graphics!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy S

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: I don't need a tablet to do a lot, so this is a fantastic buy and meets my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nix

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product with many features for such a reasonable price. Setup is very easy. Connection to the internet quickly and I would recommend it to anyone. Definitely a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of $$$
customer_reviews.text: Tablet died after about a year, RCA support is totally worthless. When it did work it was super slow, and randomly rebooted all the time.
customer_reviews.author: brickjuggler

customer_reviews.title: good fit
customer_reviews.text: this is fantastic. I hate touchpads. give me a keyboard and mouse and i'm good.
customer_reviews.author: joseph nunes

customer_reviews.title: Great offering by RCA.  Great bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Battery life leaves a bit to be desired, but so far this little tyke is taking what I dish out. I have the android version and it is integrating into my world nicely. Will be getting another for the GF shortly.
customer_reviews.author: Fred R.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great but I had to return.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great I just didn't know that it doesn't run Adobe Flash and I needed that for my class so I had to return it. I'm sure I could have found out beforehand whether or not it ran it but I didn't. It was a nice size too, such a shame. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Artman

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet but slow operating startup speeds
customer_reviews.text: Operates way too slow, Otherwise the greatest tablet. Takes 30 to 45 minutes to make the operating speeds, speed up. Every time you start the tablet, you have to clear the catch and close unnecessary apps through the settings section.
customer_reviews.author: Mattnol01

customer_reviews.title: Does not last.
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted 6 weeks. Does not even turn on anymore. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Tucker

product_meta.title: RCA Viking Pro 10" 2-in-1 Tablet 32GB Quad Core with Touchscreen and Detachable Keyboard Google Android 5.0
product_meta.description: Touchscreen Detachable Keyboard Built-in WiFi and Bluetooth v4.0 Up to 6 hours of run time on a full charge 32GB onboard storage memory, additional memory via microSD card slot.
feature_bullets: 1.4GHz MediaTek MT8127 Quad Core Processor, 1 GB DDR SDRAM RAM, Built-in 32GB Memory
10.1" IPS LCD Touchscreen Display(Resolution: 1280X800), Dual Camera: 2M Pixel for both Front Facing and rear facing camera
Android 5.0 operating system, bluetooth, 1xHDMI, 1x Micro-USB, 1xUSB, 1xheadphones mini jack(3.5mm), 1x microSDHC
Detachable keyboard, 6 hours battery life, 2.29 lbs
